snippet.title: Neva – Gameplay Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Neva is coming to Nintendo Switch in 2024! 
 
Neva is an emotionally-charged action adventure from the visionary team behind the critically acclaimed GRIS. Neva chronicles the story of Alba, a young woman bound to a curious wolf cub following a traumatic encounter with dark forces. Together they embark on a perilous journey through a once-beautiful world as it slowly decays around them. 
 
#Neva #NintendoSwitch
